title.narrative: Ethiopia Promoting Basic Services Program Phase III Project

description.narrative: PBS 3 will contribute to the higher-level objective of expanding access and improving the quality of basic services by fundingblockgrants that ensure adequate staffing and operations, and by strengthening the capacity, transparency, accountability andfinancialmanagement of sub-national governments. The program defines basic services as education, health, agriculture, watersupply and sanitation and rural roads.

participating-org.narrative: Government of the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Audit Follow-up Progress Reports | Description :Annual progress reports on the actions taken on significantaudit findings, six months after Project Audits are due, i.e., July 7 | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Effectiveness condition | Description :Submission of legal opinion and Project Operations Manual acceptable toIDA | Due Date :01-Jan-2013
Finance Agreement :Independent Procurement Review | Description :Complete an Independent Procurement Review of procurementactivities under Subprogram B | Due Date :30-Jun-2015
Finance Agreement :Independent Procurement Review | Description :Complete an Independent Procurement Review of procurementactivities under Subprogram B | Due Date :30-Jun-2017
Finance Agreement :JRIS/ JBAR | Description :Satisfactory completion every six months of the JRIS/JBAR reviews of Core PBSPrinciples, with involvement of regions and sectors | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Mid-term Review | Description :Complete a Mid-term Review of the PBS program | Due Date :30-Jun-2015
